entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Toronto Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:32 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto City Centre Airport 10:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 1.5°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 61 %
Dewpoint: -5.2°C
Wind: W 33 km/h gust 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
